title: Jasminum malabaricum
Vernacular name: English- Malabar jasmine </br> Hindi- Mogra </br> Gujarati- mogro </br> Sanskrit- Mudgara Sinhala, Pichcha </br>
Chemical Constituents: benzyl acetate, jasmone, resin, glycoside, phenols, salicylic acid, terpenoids, jasminine, tannins, saponins
Therapeutic uses: used for the treatment of Cataract, as a blood purifier and in cosmetic and detergent industries. Also known for its antibacterial, antioxidant, blood purifier, anti-tumor properties
